short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a random fanfic from the search results on AO3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser extension that allows you to randomly select and open a fanfiction from the website Archive of Our Own (AO3) in a new tab. It works on any search or bookmark page on AO3, and it considers all pages of the website with any filters. Essentially, it allows you to discover new fanfictions that you may not have come across otherwise, adding an element of surprise and randomness to your reading experience on AO3.
